title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Develop clear and comprehensive project requirements for the wearable health diagnostic device.

title: Design Hardware Architecture for the Device
description: Develop a plan for the hardware components required to monitor and diagnose health conditions.

title: Design Software Architecture for the Device
description: Develop a plan for the software components required to monitor and diagnose health conditions.

title: Design User Interface for the Device
description: Create a user-friendly interface for displaying health data and diagnostic results.
dependencies: Design Hardware Architecture for the Device
Design Software Architecture for the Device

title: Develop Firmware for the Device
description: Write firmware to control the hardware components and interface with the software.
dependencies: Design Hardware Architecture for the Device

title: Develop Mobile Application for Data Collection and Visualization
description: Create a mobile application to collect data from the wearable device and display diagnostic results.
dependencies: Design User Interface for the Device

title: Develop Cloud Infrastructure for Data Storage and Analysis
description: Create a secure and scalable cloud infrastructure to store and analyze health data.
dependencies: Design Software Architecture for the Device

title: Implement Data Privacy and Security Measures
description: Ensure that health data is handled securely and according to privacy regulations.
dependencies: Develop Cloud Infrastructure for Data Storage and Analysis

title: Test the Device Functionality and Performance
description: Perform extensive testing to ensure the device works correctly and performs optimally.
dependencies: Develop Mobile Application for Data Collection and Visualization
Implement Data Privacy and Security Measures

title: Document Project Implementation and User Guide
description: Create detailed documentation on the project implementation and user guide.
dependencies: Test the Device Functionality and Performance
